ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] A recap of the 6/6 patch.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The Broken Quest Issues are not broken quests. They are preexisting stories for future expansion. *Not sure if this applies to Fabian or not. ...
ygData.messageBody:
>
The "Broken Quest Issues" are not broken quests. They are preexisting
stories for future expansion.
*Not sure if this applies to Fabian or not.
>


Suuuuuuure. Just like the missing songs a few months ago were left for
future expansion? Until, of course, Gordon admitted that they'd run out of
ideas (paraphrasing) for the 49th.

/em sighs, clearly disappointed.

There was also some talk last night of new hybrid spells available from
vendors. I checked our vendor in FV and no new songs. I suppose I'm not
being literal enough; I'd be nuts to confuse songs with 'spells', right? ;)

-KS

(less than a bub away from being a Scary Bard)
